name: @js-heap-inspector/causal-link-cli
description: CLI for causal link analysis of V8 heap snapshots

scripts.v8:full-runtime-converter: yarn run v8:runtime-converter ./data/base.heapsnapshot --output ./data/base.runtime.json && yarn run v8:runtime-converter ./data/modified.heapsnapshot --output ./data/modified.runtime.json
scripts.v8:full-causal-link:primitive: yarn run v8:full-runtime-converter && yarn run v8:causal-link:primitive
scripts.v8:full-causal-link:heuristic-greedy: yarn run playwright-performance-reporter-converter && yarn run v8:full-runtime-converter && yarn run v8:causal-link:heuristic-greedy
